description: Create a time sheet line item equipment requirement.
permissions: Allowed if the user is authorized for the related time sheet line item via delegated policy to the time sheet. Admins are allowed. Non-admin access follows TimeSheetPolicy based on the time sheet subject (e.g., broker members, customer managers, trucker/driver roles, laborer users on labor requirements, or authorized work order roles/assignments).
side_effects: Creates a time sheet line item equipment requirement link; when is_primary changes, it synchronizes the linked time sheet line item equipment_requirement_id.
validation_notes: --time-sheet-line-item is required. --equipment-requirement is required. --is-primary must be "true" or "false" when provided. equipment_requirement_id must be unique per time_sheet_line_item_id. Time sheet line item must belong to a time sheet with a LaborRequirement subject. equipment_requirement must be on the same job_production_plan as the labor requirement. time_sheet_line_item and equipment_requirement relationships are create-only. is_primary defaults to false when not set.
